info.title: ZuoraAPI
info.description: Neuron ESB Provided Swagger Interface to interact with Zuora Rest API

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to retrieve the entire product catalog, including all products, features, and their corresponding rate plans, charges. Products are returned in reverse chronological order on the UpdatedDate field.

post.description: Establishes a connection to the Zuora REST API service based on a valid user credentials.

get.description: This REST API retrieves the invoice PDF file.

post.description: This REST API reference describes how to return unique signature and token values that used to process a CORS enabled API call.

get.description: The hostedpages call returns the Payment Pages configuration metadata, specifically, page ID, page version, payment method type.

post.description: The document call generates a quote document and returns the generated document URL. You can directly access the generated quote file through the returned URL.

get.summary: Revenue Rules: Get the rule associated with a charge
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the revenue recognition rule associated with a subscription charge by specifying the charge ID. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Settings: Get the revenue automation start date
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the revenue automation start date. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.description: This REST API reference describes how to create a customer account with a credit-card payment method, a bill-to contact, and an optional sold-to contact. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided. Use this method to optionally create a subscription, invoice for that subscription, and collect payment through the default payment method. The transaction is atomic; if any part fails for any reason, the entire transaction is rolled back.
This REST API reference describes how to update a customer account by specifying the account-key.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to retrieve detailed information about the specified customer account.
This REST API reference describes how to retrieve detailed information about a specified subscription amendment.
This REST API reference describes how to retrieve detailed information about an amendment with the specified subscription.

get.summary: Get Charge Summary Details by CRS number
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to retrieve the details of a charge revenue summary by specifying the charge revenue summary number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Get Charge Revenue Summary Details by Charge ID
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to retrieve the details of a charge revenue summary by specifying the subscription charge ID. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Get Custom Foreign Currency Exchange Rates
get.description: This feature is in Limited Availability. If you wish to have access to the feature, submit a request at Zuora Global Support.

post.description: This reference describes how to cancel a journal run using the REST API.
This REST API reference describes how to create a journal run. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.
This reference describes how to delete a journal run using the REST API.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get information about a journal run. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.description: This reference describes how to perform a mass action through the REST API. See Mass Updater for more information about performing mass actions.

get.description: This reference describes how to get information about the result of a mass action through the REST API. See Mass Updater for more information about mass actions.

post.description: This reference describes how to stop a mass action through the REST API. You can stop a mass action when its status is Pending or Processing. After you have stopped a mass action, you can get the mass action result to see details of the mass action.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get a notification history for callouts.
This REST API reference describes how to get a notification history for notification emails.

post.description: This REST API reference describes how to create a new credit card payment method for a customer account.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to retrieve all credit card information for the specified customer account.

post.description: Updates an existing credit card payment method for the specified customer account.
Deletes a credit card payment method from the specified customer account.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get revenue event details by specifying the revenue event number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Get revenue events for a revenue schedule
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get all revenue events in a revenue schedule by specifying the revenue schedule number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Get revenue items by charge revenue summary number
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the details for each revenue item in a charge revenue summary by specifying the charge revenue summary number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Get revenue items by revenue event number
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the details of each revenue item in a revenue event by specifying the revenue event number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.summary: Update custom fields on revenue items by revenue event number

put.summary: Update custom fields on revenue items by the revenue schedule number
put.description: This REST API reference describes how to update custom fields on revenue Items by specifying the revenue schedule number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.summary: Create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item (distribute by date range)
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item and distribute the revenue by specifying the recognition start and end dates.

post.summary: Create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item (manual distribution)
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item and manually distribute the revenue.

get.summary: Get a revenue schedule by invoice item
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the details of a revenue schedule by specifying the invoice item identifier. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.summary: Create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item Adjustment (distribute by date range)
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item Adjustment and distribute the revenue by specifying the recognition start and end dates.

post.summary: Create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item Adjustment (manual distribution)
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to create a revenue schedule for an Invoice Item Adjustment and manually distribute the revenue.

post.summary: Create a revenue schedule on a subscription charge
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to create a revenue schedule by specifying the subscription charge. This method is for custom unlimited revenue recognition only. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Get revenue schedule details of a subscription charge
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the revenue schedule details by specifying subscription charge ID. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.description: This REST API reference describes how to delete a revenue schedule by specifying its revenue schedule number.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the details of a revenue schedule by specifying the revenue schedule number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.description: This REST API reference describes how to distribute revenue by specifying the revenue schedule number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.summary: Distribute revenue on a specific date
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to distribute revenue on a specific recognition date. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.summary: Distribute revenue by recognition start and end dates
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to distribute revenue by specifying the recognition start and end dates. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.summary: Get a revenue schedule by invoice item adjustment
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get the details of a revenue schedule by specifying a valid invoice item adjustment identifier. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

post.description: This REST API reference describes how to get basic information of a revenue schedule by specifying the revenue schedule number. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.
This REST API reference describes how to create a new subscription for an existing customer account.

get.description: Retrieves all subscriptions associated with the specified account.
This REST API reference describes how to retrieve detailed information about a specified subscription.

post.description: Renews a termed subscription using existing renewal terms.
This REST API reference describes how to cancel an active subscription
This feature is in Limited Availability. If you wish to have access to the feature, submit a request at Zuora Global Support.
This feature is in Limited Availability. If you wish to have access to the feature, submit a request at Zuora Global Support.
This REST API reference describes how to manually create a summary journal entry. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

put.description: This reference describes how to cancel a summary journal entry using the REST API.

post.description: This reference describes how to delete a summary journal entry using the REST API.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to get information about a summary journal entry by its journal entry number.

get.summary: Get All Summary Journal Entries in a Journal Run
get.description: This REST API reference describes how to retrieve information about all summary journal entries in a journal run.

post.summary: Update Basic Information of a Summary Journal Entry
post.description: This REST API reference describes how to update the basic information of a summary journal entry. Request and response field descriptions and sample code are provided.

get.description: Retrieves payments for a specified account.

post.description: Generates invoices and collects payments for a specified account.

This REST API reference describes how to post or import usage data for one or more accounts in the CSV format. There are no path or query parameters. The data is uploaded using the HTTP multipart/form-data POST method and applied to the user's tenant.

get.description: This REST API reference describes how to retrieve usage details for an account. Usage data is returned in reverse chronological order.
